item.title: Clear or Flush ARP/DNS Cache in OSX
item.description: To clear the address resolution protocol cache, simply enter the following command in the terminal. sudo arp -a -d To clear the domain name system cache, simply enter the following command in the terminal. dscacheutil -flushcache
